QuestData.Title: Lingering Doubt
QuestData.Description: I heard that there has been some strange behavior down at The Widow's Wail to the north.$B$BHyacinth and I went to investigate, and I am certain that some presence of the sha has found its way into the cavern.$B$BI created this device to measure sha energy levels.$B$BIf you are going that way, would you mind taking measurements of any sha disturbances?$B$BThe disturbances look like streams of white and black sha energy pouring from the ground.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Sha Attunement Device at the Sha Disturbances in The Widow's Wail. The entrance to The Widow's Wail can be found to the north along the coast, south of Sri-La Village.
